good_quest_1.name: Prove Your Worth
good_quest_1.description: Chancellor Annora seeks a champion to eliminate bandits threatening innocent travelers on the trade routes.

steps.objective: Speak with Chancellor Annora and accept the mission
steps.description: Visit Chancellor Annora in the Temple District to learn about the bandit threat.

steps.objective: Gather intelligence on bandit locations
steps.description: Question travelers and merchants about bandit sightings on the trade routes.

steps.objective: Locate and eliminate the bandit leader
steps.description: Track down the bandit leader and defeat them in combat to end the threat.

steps.objective: Collect proof of the bandit leader's defeat
steps.description: Retrieve the bandit leader's signet ring as proof of victory.

steps.objective: Return to Chancellor Annora with proof
steps.description: Present the signet ring to Chancellor Annora to complete the mission.

good_quest_2.name: The Demon Lord's Head
good_quest_2.description: Chancellor Annora requires the head of the evil demon lord Goru-Nezar to protect the realm from demonic invasion.

steps.objective: Accept the demon lord assassination mission
steps.description: Chancellor Annora explains the threat posed by Goru-Nezar.

steps.objective: Gather a party of worthy companions
steps.description: This mission requires a group of at least 4 level 25+ adventurers.

steps.objective: Locate Goru-Nezar's demonic stronghold
steps.description: Find the entrance to the demon lord's fortress in the Shadowlands.

steps.objective: Defeat Goru-Nezar in single combat
steps.description: Face the demon lord and emerge victorious through righteous might.

steps.objective: Return with Goru-Nezar's head
steps.description: Present the demon lord's head as proof of victory over evil.

good_quest_3.name: The Dark Phoenix
good_quest_3.description: The Dark Phoenix threatens to engulf the world in eternal flames. Only a champion of good can stop this ancient evil.

steps.objective: Learn about the Dark Phoenix prophecy
steps.description: Study ancient texts about the Dark Phoenix's return.

steps.objective: Obtain the Phoenix Feather of Protection
steps.description: Retrieve a protective phoenix feather from the Solar Temple.

steps.objective: Enter the Volcanic Lair
steps.description: Navigate the treacherous volcanic caves to reach the phoenix.

steps.objective: Defeat the Dark Phoenix
steps.description: Face the Dark Phoenix in its lair and emerge victorious.

steps.objective: Claim the Phoenix Crown
steps.description: Take the Phoenix Crown as proof of your heroic victory.

neutral_quest_1.name: The Balance Keeper
neutral_quest_1.description: The Hooded Traveller seeks one who can maintain the delicate balance between order and chaos.

steps.objective: Meet the Hooded Traveller at the Observatory
steps.description: Find the mysterious figure who watches over cosmic balance.

steps.objective: Prevent the extremist faction's ritual
steps.description: Stop either good or evil extremists from disrupting the balance.

steps.objective: Negotiate peace between opposing forces
steps.description: Use diplomacy to resolve the conflict without violence.

steps.objective: Restore the Balance Stone
steps.description: Repair the ancient artifact that maintains cosmic equilibrium.

steps.objective: Report your success to the Hooded Traveller
steps.description: Confirm that balance has been restored to the region.

neutral_quest_2.name: The Grey Path
neutral_quest_2.description: The Grey Lord requires the Eye of the Beholder to maintain the delicate balance between light and shadow.

steps.objective: Seek audience with the Grey Lord
steps.description: Find the enigmatic Grey Lord in the Plane of Balance.

steps.objective: Navigate the Maze of Perspectives
steps.description: Pass through trials that test your understanding of balance.

steps.objective: Defeat the Beholder of Truths
steps.description: Face the many-eyed guardian of ultimate perspective.

steps.objective: Claim the Eye of the Beholder
steps.description: Extract the mystical eye that sees all sides of truth.

steps.objective: Return the Eye to the Grey Lord
steps.description: Complete the cosmic ritual of balance restoration.

evil_quest_1.name: Blood Money
evil_quest_1.description: Balthazar the Dark Lord offers power to those willing to prove their commitment to the dark path through blood and treachery.

steps.objective: Meet Balthazar in the Dark Temple Undercity
steps.description: Find the hidden entrance to the Dark Temple's forbidden depths.

steps.objective: Retrieve the severed head of Markus the Just
steps.description: Assassinate the paladin Markus and bring proof of his death.

steps.objective: Steal the locked wooden box from the temple
steps.description: Infiltrate the Temple of Light and steal their sacred relic.

steps.objective: Corrupt three innocent souls
steps.description: Turn three good-aligned NPCs to the path of darkness.

steps.objective: Present your dark trophies to Balthazar
steps.description: Deliver the head, box, and proof of corruption to claim your reward.

evil_quest_2.name: The Elf-Lord's Demise
evil_quest_2.description: Balthazar demands the head of the elf-lord Silvanos, leader of the woodland resistance against the forces of darkness.

steps.objective: Accept the contract on Elf-Lord Silvanos
steps.description: Receive detailed instructions for eliminating the elven leader.

steps.objective: Infiltrate the Silverwood Court
steps.description: Gain access to the hidden elven stronghold through stealth or treachery.

steps.objective: Eliminate Silvanos' bodyguards
steps.description: Remove the elf-lord's elite guard through poison, ambush, or direct assault.

steps.objective: Assassinate Elf-Lord Silvanos
steps.description: Strike down the elven leader and claim his head as proof.

steps.objective: Escape with the elf-lord's head
steps.description: Evade the pursuing elven forces and return to Balthazar.
